sentences.en: During a rigorous chemotherapy regimen, he went into shock with blood poisoning.
sentences.cn: 在一次要求严格的化疗疗程中, 他陷入血中毒引起的休克.

sentences.en: Effect of regimen of EA + G - CSF was better than that of Cy + G - CSF.
sentences.cn: 动员方案中EA+G - CSF组 要好于Cy+G - CSF组,其差异有统计学意义.

sentences.en: GVHD prophylaxis regimen consisted of cyclosporine ( CsA ) and mycophenolate mofetil ( MMF ).
sentences.cn: 移植物抗宿主病(GVHD) 的预防采用环孢菌素A ( csa ) +霉酚酸酯 ( MMF ) 方案.

sentences.en: I was wondering if you could teII me what skin - care regimen you use.
sentences.cn: 我很好奇你能告诉我你用什么护肤品吗?

sentences.en: KW: I heard you had avery serious training regimen for this part.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯: 听说你为了接拍这个角色,还接受了很是严格的训练历程.

sentences.en: Life in a nursery provides children with a strict daily regimen.
sentences.cn: 孩子在托儿所饮食起居都有规律.

sentences.en: Method: 78 cases were treated with VP ( VDS + DDP ) or MVP ( MMC + VDS + DDP ) regimen.
sentences.cn: 方法: 78例患者分别用VP ( VDS+DDP ) 方案和MVP ( MMC+VP ) 方案治疗.

sentences.en: Methods: 56 patients with lung cancer were treated with CVAD and CCE regimen.
sentences.cn: 方法: 应用CVAD与CCE两 种联合化疗方案治疗56例肺癌,观察疗效和毒性反应,并采用两样本比较的秩和检验或χ2检验.

sentences.en: Ms. Li said she learned the hard way about the school's regimen.
sentences.cn: 李小姐说,她从亲身经历的教训中认识到了这所学校的严格.

sentences.en: Now how about adding a little alcohol to your regimen?
sentences.cn: 现在,在你的养生法中来加一点酒精怎样?

sentences.en: Only the strongest bodies can live and enjoy health, under an unwholesome regimen.
sentences.cn: 只有最强健的身体才能在不卫生的饮食下生存并享受健康带来的乐趣.

sentences.en: Over the next few months he underwent a grueling regimen of chemotherapy.
sentences.cn: 随后的几个月里,他经受了极度疲劳的化疗.

sentences.en: Patients maintain a strict dietary regimen.
sentences.cn: 病人严格遵守饮食规律。

sentences.en: Patients with tumors > 1 cm received chemotherapy by using CMF regimen.
sentences.cn: 对>1cm的浸润性癌,用CMF方案辅助化疗.

sentences.en: Under such a regimen you'll certainly live long.
sentences.cn: 你这样养生一定可以长寿.

sentences.en: We used a combined regimen of injection treatment and radiation therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们采用了针剂注射和放射治疗相结合的方法.

words.tran_cn: 政权，政体；社会制度；管理体制
[医]养生法；生活规则；政体；支配

trans.tran_cn: （为病人规定的）生活规则，养生法，养生之道
trans.tran_en: a special plan of food, exercise etc that is intended to improve your health
